objects.text:
• Handcrafted natural straw design
• Premium leather straps & brass details
• Perfect for beach days & summer outfits
Limited time offer • While supplies last

product_details.name: Bohemian Woven Straw Crossbody Bag - Perfect Summer Half-Moon Purse
product_details.description:
• Handcrafted natural straw woven design for authentic boho charm
• Premium brown leather straps and accents for durability and style
• Antique brass hardware details and secure snap closure
• Half-moon silhouette perfect for summer outfits and beach days
• Adjustable crossbody strap for comfortable wear
• Compact size ideal for essential items
• Lightweight and eco-friendly material
• Versatile design suitable for casual and resort wear
• High-quality woven construction ensures durability
• Perfect blend of traditional craftsmanship and modern style

banner_details:
This promotional banner features a bold and modern design, split vertically into two gradients: a light cream tone on the left and a warm ochre tone on the right. The product, a natural straw crossbody bag with leather straps, is prominently displayed on the right half. Text elements are organized neatly on the left, with the bold main heading (`heading`) at the top, a vibrant red sales announcement (`tagline`) just below, and a stylized subheading (`subheading`) describing the product category. Supporting copy (`description`) highlights key product features. Price details (`price` and `original_price`) are emphasized in large fonts, paired with a strong call-to-action button (`cta_button` and `cta`) and a light disclaimer (`disclaimer`) underneath.

**Color Palette:**
- Cream (#F9F3E5)
- Ochre (#D19C57)
- Deep Brown (#8B4513)
- Burnt Orange (#FF4500)
- Warm Tan (#C17E3F)
- White (#FFFFFF)
- Charcoal Brown (#654321)
product_color: The product image showcases a woven handbag featuring a blend of natural, earthy tones that evoke a rustic and eco-chic vibe. The dominant color is a warm beige (#F0EAD6), representing the woven straw material, which forms the base of the bag. Complementing this is a rich camel brown (#A0522D) used for the leather strap and accents. Brass hardware in an antique gold hue (#8B7D58) adds a touch of vintage detailing. The colors are naturally blended—the coarse beige texture contrasting with the smooth leather accents while still harmonizing. For an ad banner, use this neutral, minimalist palette to convey elegance and nature.
